articles.content: Joe Burrow calls his shots. Take a Week 17 game against the Kansas City Chiefs when, at the start of the third quarter, he looked at JaMarr Chase on the sideline and said, Youre about to score a touc… [+16503 chars]

articles.title: Borna Coric spoils Rafael Nadal's return from 6-week layoff with 3-set win at Western & Southern Open - ESPN
articles.description: Borna Coric spoiled Rafael Nadal's return from a six-week layoff, beating the Spanish star 7-6 (9), 4-6, 6-3 on Wednesday night in the Western & Southern Open.
articles.content:
MASON, Ohio -- Borna Coric spoiled Rafael Nadal's return from a six-week layoff, beating the Spanish star 7-6 (9), 4-6, 6-3 on Wednesday night in the Western & Southern Open.
